title: Pep Guardiola eyeing summer move for Bayern Munich's Juan Bernat to solve left-back problem
text:
Juan Bernat is top of Pep Guardiola's summer wishlist (Photo: Bongarts) Share Get football     
Pep Guardiola has got Bayern Munich left back Juan Bernat on his summer transfer hit-list. 
Manchester City boss Guardiola is looking to sign two full backs, a centre half and midfield reinforcements as he looks to overhaul the squad at the Etihad. 
He signed Bernat from Valencia in 2014 and the Spaniard is on City’s radar with him likely to cost in excess of £20m. 
Guardiola is already looking at Southampton centre half Virgil Van Dijk as their centre half signing this summer. 
They are desperate for full backs with Valencia’s Jose Gaya another on City’s list but they will face major competition with Arsenal another club interested. Read More
